About

Hi there. I am MohammadReza who born in BandarAbbas, Iran. My persian name written as محمدرضا‍ and pronounced as [mo:ha:mad:re:za] [sa:la:ri]. I got my BS in Software Engineering after graduating from Azad University of BandarAbbas. Now i work as Software Engineer as Freelance.
